ovdesc.p: ACTIVITY.MESSAGING is delivery component for financial products designed using arrangement architecture. The ACTIVITY.MESSAGING Property Class will control the link between activities and the soft delivery and will be used to send messages based on an activity. The property will allow either specific activities, or activity classes to be defined and linked to the EB.ADVICES records. Rules for delivery can be defined at product level and individual arrangement level if needed.

This field provides a link to a record in EB.ADVICES. EB.ADVICES file controls the output of delivery messages, the format of the messages and deal slip formats.By defining the records on this file the users will have total control of the type and format of the eventual output. Users are also able to use their own mapping records instead of the standard ones supplied within T24, which in some cases, may not cater for particular elements of business (i.e. optional fields or sequences on a S.W.I.F.T. message).

This field denotes the activity class id for which the corresponding delivery message defined in the EB.ADVICE field should be triggered. The fields ADVICE, ACTVITY.CLASS and ACTIVITY.ID form a associated multivalue set. If a specific ACTIVITY.ID is not stated, then the same Advice would be generated for all activities which belong to this class.

For example, if there is a need to generate a message whenever rate change happens then, LENDING-CHANGE-INTEREST in this field would generate the same message for LENDING-CHANGE-CURINT as well as LENDING-CHANGE-PENINT activities where CURINT and PENINT are properties belonging to the INTEREST class.
Should be a valid AA.ACTIVITY.CLASS id.
